title: Faerie Nights
description: Why does Troy protect Lily’s grandmother? What are his stakes in rescuing her? Find out the keys to his past and discover why he chose to gift her the silver rose necklace.No faerie acknowledges a debt if they can help it…This wicked short story was first published as part of the Christmas Lites III collection, aiming to help victims of domestic abuse. You can still buy the collection and contribute. You can also sign up for the author's newsletter and get this prequel to the Faerie Sworn series for free.www.roncnieto.com/go/faeriesworn
author: Ron C. Nieto
